Before Carrie Bradshaw sat at a desk in her much-coveted Upper East Side apartment, bemoaning the lack of great unmarried men and well before she, Miranda Hobbes, Charlotte York and Samantha Jones...
title: Hair Changes, Nudity Clauses and Sarah Jessica Parker's Reluctance: How Sex and the City Painstakingly Came Together
